options.tbl-cap: Salmon counts as read from Parken _et al._ (2003).
options.label: unnamed-chunk-1

options.fig-cap: Salmon counts as read from Parken _et al._ (2003) by day with all years combined.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-2

options.fig-cap: Salmon counts scaled (from 0 to 1) by the maximum count each year.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-3

options.fig-cap: Salmon counts shifted and scaled (from 0 to 1) by the maximum count, and the corresponding day, within each year.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-4

options.fig-cap: Gaussian probability density fitted to the scaled and shifted counts.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-6

options.fig-cap: Four Gaussian curves with the same spread describe the observed salmon abundance. 5 or 6 observations in each year estimate just 2 parameters: abundance and timing.
options.label: unnamed-chunk-20
